channel.title: Adding Santa, and he hands out 2 rares...?
channel.description:
Ok, here's my dielima,
I cannot add an npc (in this case 1552: santa) and have it say, Ho Ho Ho, Merry Christmas! and then hand out a rare, and only 1 time only. Can someone help?
If they can help with this, there is a huge reward.
[s]V Don't ask what it is V[/s]

item.title: Adding Santa, and he hands out 2 rares...?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I just read his thing, its not a case lol.

You go to either first click Npc case something or:

second click Npc which is case 17:

“trade Option”

Then scroll down till you see wanneshop

and follow that format. And then add the vars, like mod adam say, add the token(save it to moreinfo file). so it will save.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Santa, and he hands out 2 rares...?

Okey dokey artichokie go into to npc.java and search for timer and set to 150 and below it set the coords you want it to go to.
